name: thr@w
description:
must be hiding inside here... oh no...

WHAT

thr@w is an short, action focused roguelite. you can pick and throw almost everything you encounter, and time slows down when you don't move!

every run is randomized, but daily runs are the same for everyone each day (NOT SURE AT ALL) and you can retry them. even if you always go for a random run, I guess that you may win for the first time in 20-30 minutes of playtime.

the game has been made in around 8 days, for the 2020 7DRL challenge, and sadly it didn't make it to the deadline. it's filled with spiders, but hopefully there's not many other bugs around!

hope you like it! I'd love to hear your feedback! :)

CONTROLS <keyboard n mouse> // [gamepad]

move: · // [left stick]·[d-pad]

grab: ·· // [A]

throw: ·· // [B]·[X]

advance time: · // [LB]

menu:

// [menu]

quit:

others

toggle camera tilt:

toggle bloom*:

toggle sound:

cycle window size:

*please, don't :(

OTHER STUFF

thr@w is done in GameMaker Studio 2

pixel art done using Aseprite and the built-in GMS2 sprite editor

music and sfx done using Ableton Live 10 Intro

pixel fonts 'm5x7' and 'm3x6' made by managore

you can reach me at @sergio_pks!
